en-US.alphabetize_comment: Will rearrange tags to be alphabetical
en-US.wrap_comment: Wrap the values with a pair of delimiters to allow strict searching for a single value
en-US.format_comment: Convert the tags to Title Case when displaying the value
en-US.sanitize_comment: Removes any non-alphanumeric characters and converts spaces to hyphens
en-US.placeholder_text: Enter tag and then hit enter or comma...
en-US.icon_left_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the left of the input
en-US.icon_right_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the right of the input
